install_msg: Thanks for installing my Cog. For any feature requests/ suggestions/ bugs, feel free to shoot me a dm at Honkertonken#9221 (694835810347909161)
name: BlackFormatter
description: Format your code with black. Supports codeblocks replies and attachments!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any end user data.
